cause.description:
Urge Mike Ilitch to flash some greens and Dave to build a better bullpen. There have been too many blown holds, saves and games. 13 blowns saves so far this season vs. a total of 17 last season
1. 13 blown saves this season so far from the Tigers Bullpen
2. In need of a consistent bullpen
3. When the bullpen starts winning the Tigers will be too
cause.name: Detroit Tigers Fans for a better Bullpen
